title: Regular season home attendance of the Atlanta Falcons 2006 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Home attendance. In total the number of data points it has is 14.
In general Home attendance has stayed the same over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Home attendance, of value 583184.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Home attendance about 493515.0 was reached at Year 2014

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Home attendance, containing a total of 14 data points.
Overall Home attendance has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
